bioAsHtml:
Arnaud Héritier is a 15-year software industry architect. He worked for various companies from consultancy companies to software vendors.

He is working as Support Engineer at CloudBees, the continuous delivery leader.

He also participates to many opensource projects for several years. His major contributions are to Jenkins and Apache Maven.

acceptedTalks.title: Les Cast Codeurs - En direct de Devoxx

bio:
Arnaud Héritier is a 15-year software industry architect. He worked [for various companies](https://www.linkedin.com/in/aheritier) from consultancy companies to software vendors.

He is working as Support Engineer at [CloudBees](http://www.cloudbees.com), the continuous delivery leader. 

He also participates to many [opensource projects](https://www.ohloh.net/accounts/aheritier) for several years. His major contributions are to [Jenkins](http://jenkins-ci.org) and [Apache Maven](http://maven.apache.org).
